title: Epic: Pull Requests Tab (Milestone 4)
description: Add second major tab for viewing and managing pull requests across repositories. Users can review PRs, see threads, and take actions from terminal.
design:
- PR list view across repositories
- PR detail view with description, reviewers, threads
- Approve/reject/comment actions via API
- Tab navigation integration (key '2')
- Optional: simplified diff viewer

title: TDD: PR list API implementation
description: Write tests for ListPullRequests() across repositories. Test PullRequest struct unmarshaling. Implement internal/azdevops/git.go with PR types and list method.

title: TDD: PR list view component
description: Write tests for PR list model with table. Test PR row rendering with status, title, author, repo. Implement internal/ui/pullrequests/list.go with PRs table display.

title: TDD: PR threads and detail API
description: Write tests for GetPRDetail() and GetPRThreads() APIs. Test PR detail struct with description, reviewers, comments. Implement in internal/azdevops/git.go.

title: TDD: PR detail view component
description: Write tests for PR detail model showing description, reviewers, thread list. Test drill-down from list. Implement internal/ui/pullrequests/detail.go.

title: Implement PR actions (approve/reject/comment)
description: Add UpdatePR() API method for status changes. Create internal/ui/pullrequests/actions.go with key handlers for approve (a), reject (r), comment (c) actions. Test API calls.

title: Integrate PR tab into root app model
description: Add TabPullRequests to app model. Handle '2' key to switch tabs. Wire up PR model initialization and Update() delegation. Test tab switching between pipelines and PRs.

title: HUMAN: Add dependabot or some code analyzer to detect CVE vulnerabilities in future
Epic: Pipelines Dashboard (Milestone 1)
description: Build the core pipeline runs dashboard - the primary feature of azdo-tui. Users should see their pipeline runs in a table and be able to refresh manually.
design:
- Basic bubbletea application skeleton with root model
- Azure DevOps API integration for listing pipeline runs
- Table component displaying runs with status icons
- Manual refresh capability
- Basic lipgloss styling for pipeline status (green=success, red=failed, blue=in-progress)

title: TDD: ListPipelineRuns API implementation
description: Write tests for ListPipelineRuns() with mock Azure DevOps responses. Test pagination, field mapping, error handling. Then implement in internal/azdevops/pipelines.go with PipelineRun struct and ListPipelineRuns() method.

title: TDD: Pipeline types and data models
description: Write tests for type conversions and JSON unmarshaling. Define PipelineRun, Pipeline, state/result enums. Test edge cases. Implement internal/azdevops/types.go.

title: Create bubbletea app root model
description: Implement internal/app/app.go with Model struct, Init(), Update(), View(). Handle WindowSizeMsg, KeyMsg for quit (q/ctrl+c). Basic skeleton without pipeline integration yet.

title: TDD: Pipeline list table component
description: Write tests for runsToRows() conversion, table model initialization. Then implement internal/ui/pipelines/list.go with bubbles table integration. Model should store runs and render table.

title: Add lipgloss styling for pipeline status
description: Create internal/ui/styles/theme.go with color palette. Implement statusIcon() function: green checkmark (succeeded), red X (failed), blue spinner (inProgress), gray circle (other). Test with different statuses.

title: Implement manual refresh (r key)
description: Add KeyMsg handler for 'r' key in pipeline list Update(). Set loading state, trigger FetchPipelineRuns cmd. Test refresh updates table data.

title: Epic: Live Updates & Polling (Milestone 3)
description: Add background polling to automatically refresh pipeline data, making the dashboard feel alive. Users see real-time updates without manual refresh.
design:
- Background polling using tea.Every with configurable intervals
- PipelineRunsUpdated message type
- Status bar component showing connection state and help hints
- Loading indicators during refreshes
- Error handling for API failures

title: TDD: Polling package with tea.Msg types
description: Write tests for PipelineRunsUpdated message type. Create internal/polling/events.go with message types for pipeline updates including Runs and Err fields.

title: TDD: Background poller implementation
description: Write tests for PollPipelineRuns() and FetchPipelineRuns() tea.Cmd functions. Test interval-based polling with tea.Every. Implement internal/polling/poller.go.

title: TDD: Status bar component
description: Write tests for status bar rendering with connection state, help hints. Implement internal/ui/components/statusbar.go using lipgloss for bottom bar display (org/project · connected · ? help).

title: Add loading indicators with spinner
description: Create internal/ui/components/spinner.go using bubbles spinner. Integrate into pipeline list view to show during API calls. Test spinner visibility during loading state.

title: Implement polling error handling
description: Handle PipelineRunsUpdated.Err in pipeline list Update(). Show error in status bar or modal. Test graceful degradation when API fails. Don't crash, show last known good data.

title: Epic: Foundation & Project Setup
description: Set up Go project foundation with config loading, PAT authentication, and base Azure DevOps API client. This is the critical foundation for all other features.
design:
- Go module initialization with required dependencies (bubbletea, lipgloss, bubbles, viper, cobra, keyring)
- Configuration system using viper for ~/.config/azdo-tui/config.yaml
- PAT authentication with system keyring integration
- Azure DevOps REST API client with basic auth
- Project structure following internal/ and cmd/ layout

title: Initialize Go module and project structure
description: Run go mod init, create directory structure (cmd/azdo-tui/, internal/app/, internal/ui/, internal/azdevops/, internal/config/, internal/polling/). Set up basic main.go skeleton.

title: Add project dependencies to go.mod
description: Add required dependencies: bubbletea v1.3.4, lipgloss v1.1.0, bubbles v0.20.0, go-keyring v0.2.6, viper v1.19.0, cobra v1.8.1. Run go mod tidy.

title: TDD: Config package with viper integration
description: Write tests first for config loading from ~/.config/azdo-tui/config.yaml. Test default values (polling intervals, theme). Then implement internal/config/config.go using viper with Config struct and Load() function.

title: TDD: Keyring integration for PAT storage
description: Write tests for PAT storage/retrieval using go-keyring. Test GetPAT() and SetPAT() functions. Mock keyring for tests. Then implement internal/config/keyring.go with system keyring integration.

title: TDD: Azure DevOps API client base
description: Write tests for NewClient(), authentication headers, basic GET request structure. Mock HTTP responses. Then implement internal/azdevops/client.go with Client struct, baseURL, PAT auth, and get() helper method.

title: Epic: Polish & Enhancements (Milestone 5)
description: Final polish pass with theming, help system, and additional features. Make the app production-ready and user-friendly.
design:
- Theming system (dark, light, dracula, catppuccin)
- Help overlay with keybinding reference (? key)
- Pipeline trigger functionality
- Work items tab (kanban board view)
- .goreleaser.yaml for cross-platform builds
- Error handling polish and user messaging

title: TDD: Theming system implementation
description: Write tests for theme loading (dark, light, dracula, catppuccin). Create internal/ui/styles/themes.go with Theme interface and color palette variations. Support config.yaml theme selection.

title: Create help overlay component
description: Implement internal/ui/components/modal.go for help dialog. Show keybindings: 1-3 (tabs), Enter (drill-down), Esc (back), r (refresh), q (quit), ? (help). Trigger with '?' key. Test modal display/dismiss.

title: TDD: Pipeline trigger functionality
description: Write tests for TriggerPipeline() API. Implement branch picker, parameters input. Create internal/ui/pipelines/trigger.go with form for triggering runs. Test POST request.

title: TDD: Work items board view
description: Write tests for WIQL query API and work item fetching. Implement internal/ui/workitems/board.go with kanban-style layout (To Do, In Progress, Done columns). Add tab 3.

title: Set up goreleaser for cross-platform builds
description: Create .goreleaser.yaml with builds for linux/darwin/windows (amd64, arm64). Configure archives, checksums. Test with goreleaser build --snapshot. Document release process.

title: Polish error handling and user messages
description: Review all error messages for clarity. Add helpful error text for common issues (missing config, invalid PAT, network errors). Ensure no panics, all errors displayed gracefully in UI.

title: Epic: Pipeline Detail & Logs (Milestone 2)
description: Add drill-down capability from pipeline list to detailed timeline view and log viewer. This allows users to investigate pipeline failures and progress.
design:
- Build timeline API integration (stages, jobs, tasks)
- Detail view showing pipeline structure
- Scrollable log viewer using bubbles viewport
- Enter/Esc navigation pattern (list → detail → logs → back)
- ViewMode state management in pipeline model

title: TDD: GetBuildTimeline API implementation
description: Write tests for GetBuildTimeline() with mock timeline responses showing stages, jobs, tasks. Test Timeline struct unmarshaling. Implement in internal/azdevops/pipelines.go.

title: TDD: Build detail view model
description: Write tests for DetailModel initialization, timeline data rendering. Then implement internal/ui/pipelines/detail.go with DetailModel struct showing stages, jobs, tasks in tree structure.

title: TDD: GetBuildLogs API implementation
description: Write tests for GetBuildLogs() fetching log content for specific logID. Test plain text response handling. Implement in internal/azdevops/pipelines.go.

title: TDD: Scrollable log viewer component
description: Write tests for log viewer model with bubbles viewport. Test scrolling, line wrapping. Implement internal/ui/pipelines/logs.go with viewport integration for log display.

title: Implement Enter/Esc navigation pattern
description: Add ViewMode state (ViewList, ViewDetail, ViewLogs) to pipeline list model. Handle Enter to drill down, Esc to go back. Test navigation flow: list → detail → logs → back to list.
